ISSUE.TITLE: Call Webhook when ratelimit error
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Feature Request Hi, we are using this library in a production environment for sending messages from multiple numbers to customers. We sometimes have the problem, that we get rate limited. Is there a way to implement it, so that the signal-cli-rest-api is calling a webhook to notify us that there is a rate limit challenge waiting or any other way to get notified of that?

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: add API endpoints to list and add sticker packs see #398

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fixed json-rpc debug log outputs * moved them up a bit to also log something in case of an error see #482
added more debug logging to json-rpc mode see #482
parse challenge tokens from received response see #482
